description: The Aconcagua is a classic fleece hoody for sporty lifestyles. Now in its third generation, it still holds its own on expeditions, long and short outdoor adventures and is also suitable for everyday wear. The Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro material is comfortable and ensures you can always move freely thanks to its flexible 4-way stretch material. The fleece fabric keeps you warm, efficiently wicks away moisture and dries quickly. The hoody’s tight fit makes it your go-to mid-layer for wearing under a hardshell layer. Its tried and tested features and timeless design also make the Aconcagua perfect for wearing on its own when hiking, climbing and just enjoying your free time. The Aconcagua is made to offer superior quality, is extremely rugged and always keeps its shape.
name: Mammut Aconcagua ML Hooded Jacket - Mens
